name: Starfinder
description: Starfinder is a science fantasy role-playing game set in the far future of the Pathfinder universe, blending magic and technology.

core_mechanics.skill_system: Skill ranks with ability modifiers and class bonuses
core_mechanics.armor_class: Energy Armor Class (EAC) and Kinetic Armor Class (KAC)
core_mechanics.resolve_points: Resolve Points for special abilities and recovery

character_creation.race: Choose your character's race with racial traits
character_creation.theme: Select a theme that represents your character's background
character_creation.class: Select a class with unique class features and progression
character_creation.ability_scores: Use point buy or rolling methods with racial modifiers
character_creation.skills: Allocate skill ranks based on class and intelligence
character_creation.feats: Gain feats at 1st level and every odd level thereafter

supported_features: Skill checks with class skill bonuses
Combat with full attacks and special actions
